description: clawverify.com (Verification API) — PRD — Universal signature verifier for artifacts, messages, receipts, and attestations. Fail-closed on unknown schema/versions.

userStories.title: Verify artifact signatures
userStories.description: As a verifier, I want to validate artifact envelopes so that I can prove authorship.
userStories.notes: Implemented Cloudflare Worker with fail-closed validation and Ed25519 verification

userStories.title: Verify message signatures
userStories.description: As a platform, I want to validate signed messages so that I can bind DIDs to accounts.

userStories.title: Verify gateway receipts
userStories.description: As a marketplace, I want to validate proxy receipts so that I can enforce proof-of-harness.

userStories.title: Batch verification
userStories.description: As a auditor, I want to submit multiple envelopes so that I can verify at scale.
acceptanceCriteria: Limit batch size to prevent abuse

userStories.title: Verification provenance
userStories.description: As a compliance officer, I want verification results logged so that audits are traceable.

userStories.title: Public docs and schema registry
userStories.description: As a developer, I want clear verification docs so that I can integrate quickly.

userStories.title: Verify proof bundles
userStories.description: As a marketplace, I want proof bundle verification so that trust tiers are automated.
acceptanceCriteria: Validate URM + event chain + receipts + attestations

userStories.title: Verify event chains
userStories.description: As a auditor, I want event chain verification so that logs are tamper-evident.

userStories.title: Schema registry allowlist
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a schema registry so that validation is deterministic.

userStories.title: Verify owner attestations
userStories.description: As a platform, I want owner verification so that sybil resistance is possible.

userStories.title: Verify commit proofs
userStories.description: As a reviewer, I want commit proof verification so that agent work is trusted.
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure repo claim exists in clawclaim

userStories.title: One-call agent verification
userStories.description: As a platform, I want a single verify call so that integrations are easy.
acceptanceCriteria: Return DID validity + owner status + PoH tier

userStories.title: Scoped token introspection
userStories.description: As a service, I want token introspection so that authorization is safe.
